Warning:

Todo:

Blank TCP demo application showing TCP functions and how applications might use them. Please note that this is an example for a TCP server application - the kind of application that waits for a connection and does not initiate connection establishment towards other hosts.

Define Documentation

#define TCPS_DEMO_PORT   5001
 

Port number on which we'll be listening for incoming connections

Definition at line 102 of file tcp_server_demo.c.

Variable Documentation

INT8 tcps_demo_soch
 

This variable holds the assigned socket handle. Note that this application will reserve one TCP socket immediately and will not release it. For saving resources, TCP sockets can also be allocated/deallocated dynamically.

Definition at line 98 of file tcp_server_demo.c.

UINT8 tcps_demo_senddata
 

Used to trigger data sending
